level.heading: DENIAL, SUSPENSION, OR REVOCATION OF LICENSES AND PERMITS (ยง 16-1209)

level.text: The Department may refuse to issue, or to renew, or may revoke or suspend the license of a proprietary school or the permit of an agent for any of the following reasons:
Willful violation of any provision of this chapter;
Furnishing false or misleading information to the Department, or failure to furnish information requested;
Furnishing false, misleading, or fraudulent information regarding the school or course of instruction to a prospective student or the student’s parent(s) or guardian(s);

Engaging in false, misleading or fraudulent advertising or solicitations; or making any false promise likely to influence, persuade, or induce enrollments through agents, in advertising, or otherwise;
Failure to secure or maintain financial resources adequate for satisfactory conduct of the course of instruction offered;
Failure to secure or maintain the required corporate surety bond;
Conferring or attempting to confer a degree upon a student which purports to be the equivalent of a degree issued by a duly licensed institution of higher learning; or
Failure to conform to the tuition plan and refund policy, as approved by the Department.
